entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On `dotnet new classlib` instead of creating a useless `Class1.cs` create a file named after the directory the file was created in. #45568
  • Restore error for exe that references exe #45557

Closed

  • Change default behavior for the commands that require nuget.org #44312
    10.0.1xx
  • NETSDK1060 Error when build in linux #25605
  • Automate workload drop creation to streamline insertion process #36442

PullRequests

Created

  • Look up the target OS for crossgen2 using the full target RID #45566
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • [WIP] Checking how many tests fail #45559
    untriaged
  • Use emojis for stage and job display names #45558
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' with arcade #45563
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45561
    untriaged
  • Setup binskim globbing to artifacts/bin w/ workaround #45462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #45564
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cherry-pick 44859 into release/9.0.2xx: Fix failing tests because of "UseUwpTools" property #44882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Workaround for issue 40015: nuget restore uses 'resource' instead of 'resources' #45115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix identity of MSTest item templates #45562
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Hardcode manifest name when building source-only #45554
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates

Updated

  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support Interactive without setting verbosity explicitly in dotnet tool restore Fixes #22987 #45312
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged
  • Don't publish assets with Vertical visibility as part of the merged manifest for a vertical. #45553
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Invoke dotnet nuget why directly through API #44614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable signing in the VMR official pipeline #45517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for using Digest for base image #44461
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • (Draft) Remove `SlnFile` #45442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't require there to be a supported runtime pack runtime identifier for crossgen2 #45487
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Port a set of test fixes from main to 9.0.2xx #45549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Warn on :: use in dotnet new install towards #45422 #45552
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make assembly version logic more robust Fixes #44042 #45518
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update Helix queues to osx.15.amd64|arm64 #45543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable Nullable in Main Directory.Build.Props, Add #nullable disable to .cs Files, and Clean Up Redundant Configurations #45522
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • Support package@version syntax in dotnet new install, partial fix for #45422 #45545
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Update all test sdk references to the latest version. #45548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Split tests by method rather than class #45520
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
